documentation.text:
@title ZNSStaking
 @dev Staking contract for Zero Name Service (ZNS) domains.
@dev Initializes the contract with the addresses of ZNS domains and staking tokens.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ZNSStaking: Only the domain owner can add stake"

arguments.value: ZNSStaking: Only the domain owner can add stake

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ZNSStaking: Only the domain owner can add stake"

arguments.value: ZNSStaking: Amount must be greater than 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ZNSStaking: Amount must be greater than 0"

documentation.text:
@dev Adds a stake to the contract for the given domain tokenId.
Only the owner of the domain can add a stake.
The amount of stake to be added must be greater than 0.
The unallocated stake in the contract must be greater than or equal to the amount of stake to be added.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ZNSStaking: Only the domain owner can withdraw stake"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ZNSStaking: Only the owner of the stake can withdraw it"

arguments.value: ZNSStaking: Only the owner of the stake can withdraw it

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ZNSStaking: Only the owner of the stake can withdraw it"

devdoc.details: Staking contract for Zero Name Service (ZNS) domains.

addStake(uint256,uint256,address).details: Adds a stake to the contract for the given domain tokenId. Only the owner of the domain can add a stake. The amount of stake to be added must be greater than 0. The unallocated stake in the contract must be greater than or equal to the amount of stake to be added.

initialize(address,address).details: Initializes the contract with the addresses of ZNS domains and staking tokens.

withdrawStake(uint256,address).details: Withdraws the stake from the contract for the given domain tokenId. Only the owner of the domain can withdraw the stake. The recipient address must not be 0.

devdoc.title: ZNSStaking
